Scripts.Text:
FADEIN 5

set script_start START

START:
ccall NpcM_CharSelect var.3

if var.3 == -1
    return
endif

if var.3 == 0
    ::setCamera CAMERA_JUDGE   
elif var.3 == 1
    ::setCamera CAMERA_DEFENCE
elif var.3 == 2
    ::setCamera CAMERA_COUNSEL
elif var.3 == 3
    ::setCamera CAMERA_PROSECUTOR
elif var.3 == 4
    spawn 3

    variable 120
    position relative 0 0 0
    rotation 0 32767 OBJ_IMPA

    endspawn    
    ::setCamera CAMERA_GALLERY
elif var.3 == 5
    spawn 3

    variable 120
    position relative 0 0 0
    rotation 0 32767 OBJ_ZELDA

    endspawn
    ::setCamera CAMERA_GALLERY
elif var.3 == 6
    spawn 3

    variable 120
    position relative 0 0 0
    rotation 0 32767 OBJ_INGO

    endspawn
    ::setCamera CAMERA_GALLERY
elif var.3 == 7
    spawn 3

    variable 120
    position relative 0 0 0
    rotation 0 32767 OBJ_IMPA

    endspawn
    ::setCamera CAMERA_WITNESS
elif var.3 == 8
    spawn 3

    variable 120
    position relative 0 0 0
    rotation 0 32767 OBJ_ZELDA

    endspawn
    ::setCamera CAMERA_WITNESS
elif var.3 == 9
    spawn 3

    variable 120
    position relative 0 0 0
    rotation 0 32767 OBJ_INGO

    endspawn
    ::setCamera CAMERA_WITNESS
elif var.3 == 10
    ::DoGavelSlam
    return
elif var.3 == 11
    ::DoBubbleExclamation BUBBLE_OBJECTION NA_SE_VO_LI_SWORD_L
    return
elif var.3 == 12
    ::DoBubbleExclamation BUBBLE_HOLDIT NA_SE_VO_LI_LASH
    return
elif var.3 == 13
    ::DoBubbleExclamation BUBBLE_TAKETHAT NA_SE_VO_LI_SWORD_N
    return
elif var.3 == 14
    ::DoBubbleExclamation BUBBLE_WITNESS 0
    return
else
    return
endif



set script_start ANIMSEL

ANIMSEL:
ccall NpcM_AnimTest var.4

if var.4 == -1
    return
elif var.4 == 2

    kill NPCMAKER OBJ_IMPA
    kill NPCMAKER OBJ_INGO
    kill NPCMAKER OBJ_ZELDA

    var.5 = 0

    set script_start START
    return
elif var.4 == 1
    var.6 = var.5
    var.6 += 1
    set ext_var var.2 OBJECT_DEBUG_ANIMSELECTED = var.6
endif
Scripts.Name: Script

Messages.Name: t7
Messages.MessageText: <NS><DI>Cool, now let's call in some witnesses.

#define gTextBufPos global16.0x104A6

#define gTextboxProperties global8.0x103D4

#define SAVE_PROGRESS save32.0x18

#define UIACTOR_SELECTEDUI actor8.0x13D

#define GUI_NONE 0
#define GUI_INVESTIGATION 1
#define GUI_COURTRECORD_EVIDENCE 2
#define GUI_COURTRECORD_PROFILES 3

#define GUI_ARROWS_RIGHT 2

#define CONTROLLER_CUR_CAMERA var.1
#define CONTROLLER_CAM_ALL var.2
#define CONTROLLER_CURRENT_TEXT_POS var.4
#define CONTROLLER_CURRENT_TEXT_ID var.5
#define CONTROLLER_CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD var.6
#define CONTROLLER_CURRENT_TEXT_POSDRAW var.7
#define CONTROLLER_CURRENT_SPEAKER var.8
#define CONTROLLER_CURRENT_GUI var.9
#define CONTROLLER_CURRENT_GUIARROWS var.10

GlobalHeaders.Name: Definitions

GlobalHeaders.Text:
proc spawnSpeakerbox
    set ref_actor actor_id 1

    if ref_actor_exists false
        spawn 1
        endspawn
    endif
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc textboxActor txtbox_num speaker_actor
    await frames 3
    ::setSpeaker speaker_actor
    show_textbox_sp txtbox_num
    await textbox_on_screen false
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc textboxSpeaker txtbox_num speaker
    await frames 3
    ::setSpeakerInternal speaker
    show_textbox_sp txtbox_num
    await textbox_on_screen false
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setSelfAsSpeaker speaker
    if vACTOR_SET_SELF_AS_SPEAKER == 0
        return
    else
        ::setSpeakerInternal speaker
        set ref_actor self
        set npcmaker.isSpeaking = 1
        set vACTOR_SET_SELF_AS_SPEAKER = 0
    endif
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setSpeakerInternal speaker
    set ref_actor actor_id 1
    set UIACTOR_SPEAKER = speaker
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setUIStyle style
    set ref_actor actor_id 1
    set UIACTOR_SELECTEDUI = style
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setUIStyleArrows style arrows
    set ref_actor actor_id 1
    set UIACTOR_SELECTEDUI = style
    set UIACTOR_ARROWS = arrows

endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setUIArrows arrows
    set ref_actor actor_id 1
    set UIACTOR_ARROWS = arrows
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setUIStyleArrowsAndAlt style arrows altstyle altarrows
    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_GUI = style
    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_GUIARROWS = arrows
    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_ALT_GUI = altstyle
    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_ALT_GUIARROWS = altarrows

    set ref_actor actor_id 1
    set UIACTOR_SELECTEDUI = style
    set UIACTOR_ARROWS = arrows
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setActorAnim actor_id anim_id
    set ext_var actor_id nACTOR_SET_ANIMATION = anim_id
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setSpeaker speaker_actor
    set ext_var speaker_actor nACTOR_SET_SELF_AS_SPEAKER = 1
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setTextSpeed speed
    set ram 32 0x80114B54 speed
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setTextSound sound
    set ram 32 0x80114B58 sound
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setNpcMakerVisible actor_id
    set ref_actor npcmaker actor_id
    set npcmaker.invisible = 0
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setNpcMakerInvisible actor_id
    set ref_actor npcmaker actor_id
    set npcmaker.invisible = 1
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setCamera frame

    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CAM_ALL = 1
    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CUR_CAMERA = frame

    await frames 0
    set cutscene_frame = frame
    await frames 0

    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CAM_ALL = 0
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc setCutsceneBars
    if vSCENE_CUTSCENE_BARS == 1
        set ram 32 0x800FE474 0x20
        //set ram 32 0x800FE478 0x20
    else
        set ram 32 0x800FE474 0
        //set ram 32 0x800FE478 0
    endif
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/

proc rotate actor_id x y z sp
    set ref_actor npcmaker actor_id
    rotation rotate_by ref_actor x y z sp
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/
proc INV_CR_OPEN Style Arrows AltStyle AltArrows CrMode
    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 1
    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_COURTRECORDMODE = CrMode
    ::setUIStyleArrowsAndAlt Style Arrows AltStyle AltArrows
endproc

/*---------------------------------------*/
proc INV_CR_CLOSED
    set ext_var OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD = 0
    ::setUIStyleArrowsAndAlt GUI_NONE GUI_ARROWS_NONE GUI_NONE GUI_ARROWS_NONE
endproc
/*---------------------------------------*/
proc DoGavelSlam

    get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD

    if SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP = 1
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP2 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_GUI
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP3 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_GUIARROWS
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP4 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_ALT_GUI
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP5 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_ALT_GUIARROWS
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP6 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_COURTRECORDMODE
    endif 

    ::INV_CR_CLOSED

    ::setCamera CAMERA_GAVEL
    set ext_var OBJ_GAVEL JUDGE_DO_GAVEL = 5
    await ext_var OBJ_GAVEL JUDGE_DO_GAVEL = 1
    await frames 0
    set ext_var OBJ_GAVEL JUDGE_DO_GAVEL = 0

    if SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP = 1
        ::INV_CR_OPEN \
            SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP2 SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP3 \
            SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP4 SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP5 \
            SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP6
    endif

endproc
/*---------------------------------------*/
proc DoGavelSlamFade

    get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CAN_OPEN_COURTRECORD

    if SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP = 1
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP2 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_GUI
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP3 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_GUIARROWS
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP4 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_ALT_GUI
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP5 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_ALT_GUIARROWS
        get ext_var SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP6 OBJ_CONTROLLER CONTROLLER_CURRENT_COURTRECORDMODE
    endif 

    ::INV_CR_CLOSED

    ::setCamera CAMERA_GAVEL
    set ext_var OBJ_GAVEL JUDGE_DO_GAVEL = 5
    await ext_var OBJ_GAVEL JUDGE_DO_GAVEL = 1
    FADEOUT 0 0 0 5
    set ext_var OBJ_GAVEL JUDGE_DO_GAVEL = 0

    if SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP = 1
        ::INV_CR_OPEN \
            SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP2 SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP3 \
            SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP4 SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP5 \
            SCENE_CONTROLLER_TEMP6
    endif

endproc
/*---------------------------------------*/
proc INV_OPEN_INVESTIGATION
    ::INV_CR_OPEN \
    GUI_INVESTIGATION GUI_ARROWS_NONE \
    GUI_COURTRECORD_EVIDENCE GUI_ARROWS_NONE\
    COURTRECORD_MODE_EVIDENCE
endproc
/*---------------------------------------*/
proc DoBubbleExclamation bubble soundfx
    set ext_var OBJ_GAVEL DO_BUBBLE_EXCLAMATION = bubble
    play sfx soundfx
    await ext_var OBJ_GAVEL DO_BUBBLE_EXCLAMATION = BUBBLE_NONE
endproc
/*---------------------------------------*/
